description: Try our easy to follow Beef Fajita Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beef Fajita Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 125g can red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
350g rare roast beef, sliced, cut into strips

recipeInstructions.text: Heat rice according to packet instructions. Set aside.
Heat olive oil in large frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and capsicums and cook for 7 minutes stirring occasionally. Add garlic and fajita mix and stir for 2 minutes longer.
Add rice, beef and kidney beans to pan. Stir for 2 minutes or until heated through. Top with coriander leaves. Serve with guacamole and lime wedges.
